      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_04695990af45c82d8227fcad1a34a6016b66508c</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pivot point of a swing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gelenkpunkt eines Schwingens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Point de pivot d'une oscillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ponto do pivô de um balanço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Punto del perno di un'oscillazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημείο άξονα μιας ταλάντευσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Punta del pivote de un oscilación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the movement of a swing with respect to its pivot joint or the point of suspension. When the swing stops moving, it is vertically below the pivot point.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pivot joint</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">suspension point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">swing</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Bewegung eines 
Schwingens in Bezug auf seine Gelenkverbindung oder den Punkt der 
Aufhebung. Wenn das Schwingen stoppt zu bewegen, ist es vertikal
unterhalb des Gelenkpunktes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le mouvement d'une 
oscillation en ce qui concerne son joint de pivot ou le point de 
suspension. Quand l'oscillation cesse de se déplacer, elle est 
verticalement au-dessous du point de pivot.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o movimento de um 
balanço com respeito a sua junção do pivô ou o ponto da 
suspensão. Quando o balanço para de se mover, está 
verticalmente abaixo do ponto do pivô.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il movimento di 
un'oscillazione riguardo al relativo giunto del perno o il punto della
sospensione. Quando l'oscillazione smette di muoversi, è 
verticalmente sotto il punto del perno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη μετακίνηση μιας 
ταλάντευσης όσον αφορά την ένωση άξονά της ή το σημείο της 
αναστολής. Όταν η ταλάντευση σταματά, είναι κάθετα κάτω 
από το σημείο άξονα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el movimiento de un 
oscilación con respecto a su empalme del pivote o la punta de la 
suspensión. Cuando el oscilación para el moverse, está 
verticalmente debajo de la punta del pivote.</string>
          </description>
